channel.title: ZenithScape changing monster drops and drop rates
channel.description:
hello again,
my friend has almost completely finished making his rsps and is almost ready to be published all he needs to do is change some monsters drops and drop rates and he doesnt know how to do it.
He is using the zenithscape source + client.
Any help is appreciated,
Thanks.

cheers if we find out i’ll let you know

item.title: ZenithScape changing monster drops and drop rates
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

MacaYork:

no same problem as you have on your other thread, bandos and sara are missing along with corp and kbd

fuckk, i was ganna exchange if you help me with the godwars… ill give you something to fix all drops and drop rates… but since im a nice guy, ill send it to you in a bit
